title: Urgently Need a D3+ (d5 is ok too) Top Laner for Melbourne CBD LAN Tournament for Sunday 5th of Aug
body:
Arena Tournament is played every week in Melbourne CBD with cash prize adding up the total prize pool every week for the following 3 months.
Place for the internet cafe hosting the tournament is Genesis Internet Cafe right next to QV.

Team is urgently looking for a Top Laner for the tournament this Saturday. After the first week, its up to the team's decision whether if you are suitable in the team to play in the following weeks.

Current Roster:
Jungle: http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=rngmren Challenger 147LP
Mid: http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=ltzevilisback Challenger 367LP
AD: http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=vek Challenger 62LP
Support: http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=tiankuocui Diamond 3 60LP

We are looking for a solid top laner that adapts well into the current meta and have a decent champion pool to play with teams playstyle. Also must have good macro players to play around the map and win the game.

Competitive experience is preferred, but not essential.

Requirement is Diamond 3 preferred, But Diamond 5 minimum.

Please text me on 0451859935 or add me in game: Tiankuo Cui, linking me your op.gg if you are interested.
Thank you!
